items.sentence: Mary's kidnappers sent Tom a photo of her holding that day's newspaper, to prove that she was still alive.
Don't leave anything valuable on your dashboard. If you do, someone might break into your car to steal it.
They say you should consult the past if you want to learn about the future. History has a lot to teach us.
When things don't go the way they're expected to go, the first thing most people do is blame someone else.
We still have more than halfway to go to get to the top of the mountain. Are you really already exhausted?
